readability_reflection: I find interpolation to be more readable. F-Strings are my preferred method when dealing with strings if that option is available in the language.
comprehension_debugging: I find interpolation to be quicker to understand and debug. Concatenation can be confusing sometimes as statements get more complex especially if there are non-string items being concatenated with strings.
preference_rationale: I prefer interpolation from personal experience. It makes reading code much easier in my opinion. I have used both methods and I think interpolation is superior.
learning_curve: I have a lot of experience using both interpolation and concatenation which helped with understanding the code snippets.
suggestions_improvement: I do not have any recommendations on the syntax but as a user I find using very descriptive variable names helps with readability of both concatenation and interpolation.
